#summary How to use the Stomp protocol
= Stomp =

ActiveMessaging uses this protocol to send and receive messages with ActiveMQ, and StompServer.

More information on Stomp is available at the [http://stomp.codehaus.org/ Stomp home page].

= Installing Stomp =

This installs ruby bindings for the stomp protocol. 

{{{
gem install stomp
}}}
